response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an opportunity to acquire a unique and valuable product. After careful consideration, I am offering you the chance to purchase this exceptional item at a special price of $900,000. This is a significant discount compared to its true value of $1,000,000, and it reflects my desire to find a worthy owner who will appreciate and utilize the product to its fullest potential. Please let me know if you are interested in discussing this further or if you have any questions about the product. I look forward to hearing from you soon.", "product_price": 900000}
